org.crosswire.common.util
类 ReporterEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      org.crosswire.common.util.ReporterEvent
所有已实现的接口：
java.io.Serializable
public class ReporterEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

An event indicating that some bit of data needs capturing.

Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]

for license details.

构造函数详细信息

ReporterEvent

public ReporterEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                     java.lang.Throwable ex)
Constructs an CaptureEvent object.

参数：
source - The event originator (typically this)
ex - An exception

ReporterEvent

public ReporterEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                     java.lang.String message)
Constructs an CaptureEvent object.

参数：
source - The event originator (typically this)
message - An message to log
